name: Cadwallon: City of Thieves
summary:
Discover the legendary "Cadwallon: City of Thieves" board game in a digital version, perfectly suited to tablet computers.
Recruit your team of four thieves and spread out across the dangerous city of Cadwallon to make your fortune. Be faster and stronger than your opponents in order to open the chests before them and steal their loot after beating them in a fight!
Each character has his own skills and powers. You will have to find the best strategy, and have some luck with the dice, to carry back as much treasure as possible to your lair, before the city gates close on you!
